item.description: We will continue our "zigzag-ing" through the five main philosophical trends of the 19th and 20th centuries with Utilitarianism (the five are: Utilitarianism, Marxism, Existentialism, Pragmatism and Positivism/Analytic Philosophy). We will start with Jeremey Bentham's An Introduction to the Principles of Morals and Legislation.
item.how_to_find_us: Send an e-mail with your skype id and e-mail address to the organizer if you have never participated in skype calls before.
item.name: Skype -- Bentham: An Introduction to the Principles of Morals and Legislation
